snippet: Judge Karen Schreier on Monday declared South Dakota’s same-sex marriage ban unconstitutional, but stayed the decision pending appeal.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Karen Schreier rules South Dakota's same-sex marriage unconstitutional, but stays decision pending appeal.
lead_paragraph: Judge Karen Schreier on Monday declared South Dakota’s same-sex marriage ban unconstitutional, but stayed the decision pending appeal.

headline.main: South Dakota: Ban on Gay Marriage Is Struck Down
headline.print_headline: South Dakota: Ban on Gay Marriage Is Struck Down

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
